Control Name: Assesses Attitudes and Rationalizations—The assessment of fraud risk considers how management and other personnel might engage in or justify inappropriate actions.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Attitudes and Rationalizations—The assessment of fraud risk considers how management and other personnel might engage in or justify inappropriate actions.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.3 COSO Principle 8: The entity considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks to the achievement of objectives
